title: user login functionality
description: Test the /api/login endpoint to verify successful user login with valid credentials and proper handling of invalid credentials.

title: user registration process
description: Test the /api/register endpoint to ensure new users can register with valid data and receive appropriate errors for invalid input.

title: user logout operation
description: Test the /api/logout endpoint to confirm that authenticated users can successfully log out and receive confirmation.

title: admin dashboard access control
description: Test the /admin endpoint to verify that only authorized admin users can access the admin dashboard and unauthorized users are denied.

title: admin settings section retrieval
description: Test the /admin/settings/{section} endpoint to ensure correct retrieval of various settings sections, proper handling of invalid sections, and access control.

title: user management listing access
description: Test the /admin/users endpoint to verify that authorized admins can view the user management listing and unauthorized access is prevented.

title: list available calculators
description: Test the /calculators endpoint to confirm it returns the complete and accurate list of available engineering calculators.

title: execute calculator function
description: Test the /calculator/{module}/{function} endpoint to verify correct execution of calculations with valid input, and proper error response when calculator or function is not found.

title: get user profile data
description: Test the /profile GET endpoint to ensure authenticated users can retrieve their profile data and unauthenticated requests are denied.

title: update user profile information
description: Test the /profile PUT endpoint to verify users can update their profile information with valid data and receive errors for invalid input.
